mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dept_schedule (start_date, end_date, position, content, dept_id) values (#{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{position}, #{content}, #{deptId})
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.start_date, s.end_date, s.position, s.content, s.dept_id, (SELECT name FROM dept WHERE id = s.dept_id) AS deptName FROM dept_schedule AS s

SELECT s.id, DATE_FORMAT(s.start_date, "%Y-%m-%d") AS start, DATE_FORMAT(s.end_date, "%Y-%m-%d") AS end, s.position, s.content, s.dept_id, (SELECT name FROM dept WHERE id = s.dept_id) AS deptName FROM dept_schedule AS s WHERE s.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE dept_schedule SET start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, position = #{position}, content = #{content}, dept_id = #{deptId} WHERE id = #{id}
